impact-statement: Studies in a mouse model of spinocerebellar ataxia type 1 show that a protein called capicua stabilizes toxic ataxin-1 oligomers offering a possible explanation for regional patterns of neurodegeneration.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
